column2: "Hey, Regius. Can you hear me? Well well, that was an amazing broadcast wasn't it?"
"That girl, she was so obedient in continuing her idol work, or so I thought. I see, it was all for this moment."
"Seeing her work so hard was very amusing to me."
"Luther... is that all? We're in the middle of a battle here."
"Ah. Of course, that's not all."
"It seems like you're having a tough time over there. I thought I'd send you a present."
"They're things I no longer need. Cutting them or breaking them, I don't mind. Just do as you wish."
"...! Everyone, defend!"
"Seems like they got there safely. Making them was easy, but adjusting them was a hassle."
"I was looking for the proper timing to punish you all."
"...Luther! You bastard!"
"Do you hate me? But, I'm not a Darker, you know?"
"You ARKS who were created to eliminate Darkers... is it okay to hate the non-Darker me?"
"I'll see you later then, Regius. This evening, could you not disturb my date with her?"
"Releasing all the Claris Claes-type clones at once...that's a gaudy way to mimic someone."
"That... what... what are those... I don't know those, I don't know!"
"I...I'm right here? Then, who's the me over there?"
"Bastard...who? Who are you?"
"Tell me, tell me, Clarissa. Clarissa...Clarissaaaa..."
"Reply, Clarissa...! Why are you silent...? Why won't you tell me..."
"No, no, NO!"
"I'm scared, scared, scared scared scared..."
"Save me... someone... save me..."
"Save me... save me, Huey."
"You called, Claris Claes?"
"Huey...!"
"...It's alright. You don't have to hold it in. It was painful, wasn't it...?"
"Don't think for now, just rest."
"...Oi, Regius. You're not going say that you're protecting the ARKS like this, are you?"
"Actually, don't say it. If you did, I'd kill you."
"A method to free ones' self from absolute authority... It should be possible."
"In order to search for that method, I've submitted myself... because there was no other way to protect ARKS."
"However...!"
"This temporary balance... it's no longer worth protecting!"
"<%me>. You and the lady go on ahead."
"Alma's wish to continue the ARKS... the one to succeed her will is definitely you."
"All hands, your targets are the Claris Claes clones. Don't leave a single one behind."
"They might be degradations, but they're still clones just as powerful as her."
"Their powers and their weapons... The Ashen Staves Clarissa II... They're a pain."
"Yes, but a pain is all they are. They have no will of their own. Destroy all of them."
"You don't need to tell me!"
"It seems that Luther has lost all interest in the ARKS, huh? The laboratory isn't responding either."
"We feared this would happen, so we kept him on a short leash. However, I suppose he was too arrogant in his wishes."
"We didn't pay attention to his detached attitude, and as expected in the end, he stopped being human. Ugh, this whole situation sickens me."
"It's been many years since I stood with you like this, hasn't it? Not since 10 years ago, I think."
"Excluding the Elder War, I believe. I sincerely thank you for biding your time and training our juniors, Maria."
"I was just doing what I want. If anything, you're the one that put up with everything, Regius."
"It's our turn now. Come, Laviulis!"
"Let's begin, Genesis."
"The Only Way"
"5章 たったひとつのやりかた"
